com.ohtu.wearable.wearabledataservice.database

Class SensorDatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ohtu.wearable.wearabledataservice.database.SensorDatabaseHelper

  • public class SensorDatabaseHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to create database and access the data in it. Currently drops all previous data when the servers start.
